data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Completes
data.Description: Google has confirmed that the August 2024 core update has finished rolling out, taking a total of 19 days to complete.

data.Title: Google Trends to Discontinue Email Subscriptions on October 29th
data.Description: Google Trends will discontinue its email subscription option for trend notifications starting October 29, 2024. Users will no longer be able to create new trend alerts or receive existing ones.

data.Title: Bing Enhances Featured Snippets and Knowledge Panels with Interactive Animation
data.Description: Microsoft's Bing Search introduces an interactive animation for featured snippets and knowledge panels. Hovering over the table of contents highlights the corresponding section within the answer box.

data.Title: Google Tests New Map Pin Design
data.Description: Google tests new map pin design

data.Title: Google's "View Simplified Page" Option: A Red Flag for Poor User Experience?
data.Description: Glenn Gabe highlights Google's "View simplified page" option in search results as a potential red flag for poor user experience, urging website owners to investigate if their pages trigger this feature.

data.Title: Tracking Google's AI Overviews: A Challenge Across Browsing Modes
data.Description: Glenn Gabe discusses the challenges of tracking Google's AI Overviews, demonstrating how search results for the same query can vary significantly across different browsing modes (logged in, incognito, Search Labs).

data.Title: Understanding YouTube's Algorithm: Insights and Best Practices for Video Optimization
data.Description: This article compiles answers from YouTube Liaison and other sources regarding YouTube's algorithm and SEO, addressing factors influencing video rankings and best practices for optimization.

data.Title: Google Search Now Supports AVIF Image File Types
data.Description: Google Search now supports AVIF image file types after much anticipation and wait (and no, there is no SEO boost for using AVIF images)

data.Title: Google Testing New Shopping Search Interface on Mobile
data.Description: Google is testing a new shopping search interface on mobile - before and after attached

data.Title: Google Ads Introduces Product Category-Level Insights
Google Search Tests Accordion User Experience for "You Visit Often" Feature
data.Description: Google Search "you visit often" testing accordion user experience, instead of a label

data.Title: New Google Analytics Benchmarking Data Available in GA4
data.Description: New Google Analytics benchmarking data in GA4
